description:
The new transfer student in school has amazingly bad luck.  Could the lucky stone Fuyuki picked up as a small child hold the key to it?  Hey, are Natsumi and Saburo-senpai about to be launched into space?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki Nazo no Tenkou Shoujo ni Nani ga Okotta ka? de Arimasu / Natsumi & Saburou Modorenai Fu-ta-ri de Arimasu
La mystérieuse nouvelle / Un couple qui ne peut se comprendre
Very Superstitious, Writings on the Rock-Stone Thing!
冬樹 謎の転校少女にナニが起こったか? であります / 夏美 & サブロー 戻れないフ・タ・リ であります
